snippet: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon beseeched donors on Tuesday to fill an emergency $100 million gap in funding for the agency that aids five million Palestinian refugees.
abstract: United Nations Sec General Ban Ki-moon pleads for donations to fill unprecedented $100 million shortfall facing United Nations Relief and Works Agency; deficit could disrupt aid to five million Palestinian refugees in Middle East.
lead_paragraph: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon beseeched donors on Tuesday to fill an emergency $100 million gap in funding for the agency that aids five million Palestinian refugees.

headline.main: U.N. Chief Appeals for More Aid to Support Palestinian Refugees
headline.print_headline: Middle East; U.N. Chief Appeals for More Aid to Support Palestinian Refugees

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United Nations Relief and Works Agency
